data.text: @NatlParkService You do you and be comfortable with your choices.  And keep your politics out of everyone else’s health and well-being.   Love, USA.
@NatlParkService Wearing a mask at a park, what a joke…. Please bring Trump back
@NatlParkService Get with the times NYC dropped masks, wide open spaces need them?

@NatlParkService Imagine being so utterly insane that you think you would need a mask in a park. I got news for ya park service. We make the rules. We give the power and we pay the bills. And we can take it away and put you all on unemployment anytime. I suggest you realize that.
